title: Beautiful Apartment home, Large Floor Plan with views of the Water
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1029 Sq.
Come to Wood Creek Apartments and be one with nature in beautiful Pleasant Hill.
Our community lies adjacent to JFK University, but maintains a peaceful feel that makes it seem as though you are far-removed from school, work and the bustle of busy streets.
Wood Creek's newly renovated homes feature Energy Efficient appliances, new hard surface flooring, a cozy fireplace, built-in shelving, and a serene pond just steps from your door.
But just because you're looking for tranquility doesn't mean you have to go without urban convenience.
Hop on the BART and jet off to San Francisco, or spend the day shopping and exploring nearby Sun Valley Mall.
No matter what adventure you choose, Wood Creek makes it easy to unwind at home after a long day.

Ceiling Fan*, Wood Burning Fireplace, Microwave, Built-in Shelving*, Ample Storage, Dishwasher, Pond Views*, Spacious Patio or Balcony, Central Air Conditioning, Garage Included with Every Apartment Home!, Washer and Dryer Included, Wood Look Flooring, Vaulted Ceilings*, Refrigerator, Large Windows
Fitness Center, On-site Maintenance, Playground, Hot Tub, BBQ Grill, Swimming Pool
Max 2 Allowed | Max weight 40 lb each
